chapter.title: Documentation Conventions
chapter.para: The following notices and typographical conventions are used in this documentation:

warning.para: Vital information you must be aware of before proceeding. Warns you about security issues, potential loss of data, damage to hardware, or physical hazards.

important.para: Important information you should be aware of before proceeding.

note.para: Additional information, for example about differences in software versions.

tip.para: Helpful information, like a guideline or a piece of practical advice.

chapter.para: Commands than can be run by any user, including the &rootuser; user.
Commands that must be run with &rootuser; privileges. In many cases you can also prefix these commands with the sudo command to run them.
